      • getMetadata

        List<com.comphenix.protocol.wrappers.WrappedWatchableObject> getMetadata()
                                                                  throws IllegalStateException
        Gets a list containing all of the metadata stored in this packet
        Returns:
        the list of wrapped watchable objects
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if the spawn packet is unable to store metadata

      • setMetadata

        void setMetadata(List<com.comphenix.protocol.wrappers.WrappedWatchableObject> data)
          throws IllegalStateException
        Sets the metadata contained by this packet to the data contained in the list given
        Parameters:
        data - the new list of data to send
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if the spawn packet is unable to store metadata

      • rewriteMetadata

        void rewriteMetadata()
        Rewrites the currently stored metadata to the packet. This is useful if you pull the list instance using getMetadata() and modify it directly; it will cause the changes to be written to the underlying packet container.
